worldofzuul

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • worldofzuul.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to instantiate rooms from. Each room contains data of the room's description and exit-waypoints. Different getter/setter methods helps assign and retrieve these Strings/objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Room(java.lang.String description)
      One-arg constructor with description String.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Room getExit(java.lang.String direction)
      Getter method, retrieve Room reference for chosen direction.
      java.lang.String getLongDescription()
      Getter method for extended description of room with room descriptions and exit-waypoints from room.
      java.lang.String getShortDescription()
      Getter method for instance of room's description.
      void setExit(java.lang.String direction, Room neighbor)
      Method for designating direction of the exit point.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Room

        public Room(java.lang.String description)
        One-arg constructor with description String.
        Parameters:
        description - Passed string argument providing room description.

    • Method Detail

      • setExit

        public void setExit(java.lang.String direction,
                    Room neighbor)
        Method for designating direction of the exit point. A direction and a neighboring room is passed as arguments to the method, that are then added to the 'exits' map-object.
        Parameters:
        direction - String describing a exit direction.
        neighbor - Room object of neighboring room will be paired with description

      • getShortDescription

        public java.lang.String getShortDescription()
        Getter method for instance of room's description.
        Returns:
        Returns String of description of room instance.

      • getLongDescription

        public java.lang.String getLongDescription()
        Getter method for extended description of room with room descriptions and exit-waypoints from room.
        Returns:
        Returns String with description and exit-description.

      • getExit

        public Room getExit(java.lang.String direction)
        Getter method, retrieve Room reference for chosen direction. The chosen direction is passed to this method and the corresponding room reference is returned.
        Parameters:
        direction - String describing direction of other room.
        Returns:
        Return corresponding Room object reference.
